description: Examples for basic template cards - simple question/answer format

examples.title: Simple Science Fact
examples.front_question_text: What is the chemical symbol for water?
examples.back_explanation: Water molecules consist of two hydrogen atoms bonded to one oxygen atom.

examples.title: Simple Definition
examples.back_explanation: From Latin 'ubique' meaning 'everywhere'. Often used to describe technology or phenomena that are found in many places.

examples.title: Historical Date
examples.front_question_text: In what year did World War II end?
examples.back_explanation: World War II ended in 1945 with Germany's surrender in May and Japan's surrender in August after the atomic bombs.
